entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
